Description:
Prosecution of Precision Colour Printing Ltd following an accident investigation.  IP’s hand 
was dragged into moving rollers whilst clearing a blockage on a sheetfed printing press machine 
which resulted in fractures and de-gloving to the hand.
Address: Telford/Precision Colour PrintPrecision Colour Printing LtdHalesfield 1TELFORDShropshireTF7 4QQEngland
